verses.verse: In those<WG1565> days<WG2250> the multitude<WG3793> being<WG5607> very<WG3827> great,<WG3827> and having<WG2192> nothing<WG3385> to eat,<WG5315> Jesus<WG2424> called<WG4341> his disciples<WG3101> to him, and said<WG3004> to them,

I have compassion<WG4697> on<WG1909> the multitude,<WG3793> because<WG3754> they have now<WG2235> been<WG4357> with me three<WG5140> days,<WG2250> and have<WG2192> nothing <WG3756> <WG5100> to eat: <WG5315>
And if<WG1437> I send<WG630> them away<WG630> fasting<WG3523> to their own houses,<WG3624> they will faint<WG1590> by the way:<WG3598> for divers<WG5100> of them came<WG2240> from far. <WG3113>
And his disciples<WG3101> answered<WG611> him, From where<WG4159> can<WG1410> a man<WG5100> satisfy<WG5526> these<WG5128> men with bread<WG740> here<WG5602> in the wilderness?<WG2047>
And he asked<WG1905> them, How<WG4214> many<WG4214> loaves<WG740> have<WG2192> you? And they said,<WG2036> Seven.<WG2033>

And he commanded<WG3853> the people<WG3793> to sit<WG377> down<WG377> on<WG1909> the ground:<WG1093> and he took<WG2983> the seven<WG2033> loaves,<WG740> and gave<WG1325> thanks,<WG2168> and broke,<WG2806> and gave<WG1325> to his disciples<WG3101> to set<WG3908> before<WG3908> them; and they did set<WG3908> them before<WG3908> the people.<WG3793>
And they had<WG2192> a few<WG3641> small<WG2485> fishes:<WG2485> and he blessed,<WG2127> and commanded<WG2036> to set<WG3908> them also<WG2532> before<WG3908> them.
So<WG1161> they did eat,<WG5315> and were filled:<WG5526> and they took<WG142> up of the broken<WG2801> meat that was left<WG4051> seven<WG2033> baskets.<WG4711>
And they that had eaten<WG5315> were about<WG5613> four<WG5070> thousand:<WG5070> and he sent<WG630> them away.<WG630>
And straightway<WG2112> he entered<WG1684> into<WG1519> a ship<WG4143> with his disciples,<WG3101> and came<WG2064> into<WG1519> the parts<WG3313> of Dalmanutha.<WG1148>
And the Pharisees<WG5330> came<WG1831> forth,<WG1831> and began<WG756> to question<WG4802> with him, seeking<WG2212> of him a sign<WG4592> from heaven,<WG3772> tempting<WG3985> him.

And he sighed<WG389> deeply<WG389> in his spirit,<WG4151> and said,<WG3004> Why<WG5101> does this<WG3778> generation<WG1074> seek<WG1934> after<WG1934> a sign?<WG4592> truly<WG281> I say<WG3004> to you, There shall no<WG1487> sign<WG4592> be given<WG1325> to this<WG5026> generation. <WG1074>
And he left<WG863> them, and entering<WG1684> into<WG1519> the ship<WG4143> again<WG3825> departed<WG565> to the other<WG4008> side.<WG4008>

Now<WG2532> the disciples had forgotten<WG1950> to take<WG2983> bread,<WG740> neither<WG2532> <WG3762> had<WG2192> they in the ship<WG4143> with them more<WG1508> than<WG1508> one<WG1520> loaf.<WG740>
And he charged<WG1291> them, saying,<WG3004> Take heed,<WG3708> beware<WG991> of the leaven<WG2219> of the Pharisees,<WG5330> and of the leaven<WG2219> of Herod. <WG2264>
And they reasoned<WG1260> among<WG4314> themselves,<WG240> saying,<WG3004> It is because<WG3754> we have<WG2192> no<WG3756> bread.<WG740>

And when Jesus<WG2424> knew<WG1097> it, he said<WG3004> to them, Why<WG5101> reason<WG1260> you, because<WG3754> you have<WG2192> no<WG3756> bread?<WG740> perceive<WG3539> you not yet,<WG3768> neither<WG3761> understand?<WG4920> have<WG2192> you your<WG5216> heart<WG2588> yet<WG2089> hardened? <WG4456>
Having<WG2192> eyes,<WG3788> see<WG991> you not? and having<WG2192> ears,<WG3775> hear<WG191> you not? and do you not remember? <WG3421>

When<WG3753> I broke<WG2806> the five<WG4002> loaves<WG740> among<WG1519> five<WG4000> thousand,<WG4000> how<WG4214> many<WG4214> baskets<WG2894> full<WG4134> of fragments<WG2801> took<WG142> you up? They say<WG3004> to him, Twelve.<WG1427>

And when<WG3753> the seven<WG2033> among<WG1519> four<WG5070> thousand,<WG5070> how<WG4214> many<WG4214> baskets<WG4711> full<WG4138> of fragments<WG2801> took<WG142> you up? And they said,<WG2036> Seven.<WG2033>
And he said<WG3004> to them, How<WG4459> is it that you do not understand? <WG4920>
And he comes<WG2064> to Bethsaida;<WG966> and they bring<WG5342> a blind<WG5185> man to him, and sought<WG3870> him to touch<WG680> him.

And he took<WG1949> the blind<WG5185> man by the hand,<WG5495> and led<WG1806> him out of the town;<WG2968> and when he had spit<WG4429> on<WG1519> his eyes,<WG3659> and put<WG2007> his hands<WG5495> on him, he asked<WG1905> him if<WG1487> he saw<WG991> ought.<WG5100>
And he looked<WG308> up, and said,<WG3004> I see<WG991> men<WG444> as trees,<WG1186> walking.<WG4043>

After<WG1534> that he put<WG2007> his hands<WG5495> again<WG3825> on his eyes,<WG3788> and made<WG4160> him look<WG308> up: and he was restored,<WG600> and saw<WG1689> every<WG537> man clearly.<WG5081>
And he sent<WG649> him away<WG649> to his house,<WG3624> saying,<WG3004> Neither<WG3366> go<WG1525> into<WG1519> the town,<WG2968> nor<WG3366> tell <WG2036> it to any<WG5100> in the town. <WG2968>

And Jesus<WG2424> went<WG1831> out, and his disciples,<WG3101> into<WG1519> the towns<WG2968> of Caesarea<WG2542> Philippi:<WG5375> and by the way<WG3598> he asked<WG1905> his disciples,<WG3101> saying<WG3004> to them, Whom<WG5101> do men<WG444> say<WG3004> that I am? <WG1511>
And they answered,<WG611> John<WG2491> the Baptist;<WG910> but some<WG243> say, Elias;<WG2243> and others,<WG243> One<WG1520> of the prophets.<WG4396>
And he said<WG3004> to them, But whom<WG5101> say<WG3004> you that I am? <WG1511> And Peter<WG4074> answers<WG611> and said<WG3004> to him, You are<WG1488> the Christ.<WG5547>
And he charged<WG2008> them that they should tell<WG3004> no<WG3367> man<WG3367> of him.

And he began<WG756> to teach<WG1321> them, that the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> must<WG1163> suffer<WG3958> many<WG4183> things, and be rejected<WG593> of the elders,<WG4245> and of the chief<WG749> priests,<WG749> and scribes,<WG1122> and be killed,<WG615> and after<WG3326> three<WG5140> days<WG2250> rise<WG450> again.<WG450>
And he spoke<WG2980> that saying<WG3056> openly.<WG3954> And Peter<WG4074> took<WG4355> him, and began<WG756> to rebuke<WG2008> him.

But when he had turned<WG1994> about<WG1994> and looked<WG1492> on his disciples,<WG3101> he rebuked<WG2008> Peter,<WG4074> saying,<WG3004> Get<WG5217> you behind<WG3694> me, Satan:<WG4567> for you mind<WG5426> not the things that be of God,<WG2316> but the things that be of men. <WG444>

And when he had called<WG4341> the people<WG3793> to him with his disciples<WG3101> also, he said<WG2036> to them, Whoever<WG3748> will<WG2309> come<WG2064> after<WG3694> me, let him deny<WG533> himself,<WG1438> and take<WG142> up his cross,<WG4716> and follow<WG190> me.

For whoever <WG3736> <WG302> will<WG2309> save<WG4982> his life<WG5590> shall lose<WG622> it; but whoever <WG3736> <WG302> shall lose<WG622> his life<WG5590> for my sake<WG1752> and the gospel's,<WG2098> the same<WG3778> shall save<WG4982> it.
For what<WG5101> shall it profit<WG5623> a man,<WG444> if<WG1437> he shall gain<WG2770> the whole<WG3650> world,<WG2889> and lose<WG2210> his own soul? <WG5590>
Or<WG2228> what<WG5101> shall a man<WG444> give<WG1325> in exchange<WG465> for his soul? <WG5590>

Whoever <WG3736> <WG302> therefore<WG1063> shall be ashamed<WG1870> of me and of my words<WG3056> in this<WG5026> adulterous<WG3428> and sinful<WG268> generation;<WG1074> of him also<WG2532> shall the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> be ashamed,<WG1870> when<WG3752> he comes<WG2064> in the glory<WG1391> of his Father<WG3962> with the holy<WG40> angels. <WG32>
